gameDetails.name: Hegemonic Promo Card: Dimensional Anomaly
gameDetails.description:
A Kickstarter and convention promo card for the base game.

Once advanced, this card provides a one-use technology effect that allows you to search through the technology draw pile for one card of your choice instead of taking a normal draw action,  When used in a conflict, it provides no power but instead allows you to immediately return your inactive cards to your hand.
